translation.en: ♪ Put our crew to the test ♪
♪ All aboard, we're on our way ♪
♪ Mighty fast to save the day ♪ ♪ Mega mission to the max ♪
translation.ko: 어서 빨리 중요한 임무를 해내러 가자

translation.en: Arr, mateys! In honour of our first beach day this spring,
translation.ko: 얘들아 올봄 첫 해변의 날을 기념해

translation.en: I'll tell ye the story of the most famous train pirate
translation.ko: 역사상 가장 유명한 기차 해적 이야기를 해 줄게

translation.en: to sail the seven seas… Trackbeard!
Trackbeard is my most favourite pirate ever!
translation.ko: 턱수염 기차는 내가 제일 좋아하는 해적이야

translation.en: I made my hat just like his!
I wanted to grow a beard like his too,
but it would take way too long.
Legend says that Trackbeard sailed to this very beach
translation.ko: 전설에 따르면 턱수염 기차가 바로 이 해변까지 왔었대

translation.en: When he found it, he hid his loot in a secret cave lair,
translation.ko: 그리고 보물을 찾아서 비밀 동굴에 숨겼지

translation.en: A secret pirate cave lair filled with secret pirate cave lair treasure?!
translation.ko: 비밀 해적 보물이 가득한 비밀 해적 동굴?

translation.en: Some say that on foggy nights,
you can still see the ship sailing near Beach Station!
translation.ko: 해변 역 근처를 항해하는 그 해적선이 보인대

translation.en: Dude! What's up with Tiny? What could possibly be so exciting?
translation.ko: 타이니는 왜 저래? 뭐가 저렇게 신나지?

translation.en: Tiny! Is that a real pirate ship?
It looks super piratey to me! And super huge!
translation.ko: 내가 보기엔 진짜 같아 대박 크고!

translation.en: It can't stay here at the beach.
I'll call Max. He'll know what to do!
translation.ko: 맥스한테 전화할게 어떻게 해야 할지 알 거야

translation.en: It looks just like the one from the book!
Please report to the busy board for today's Mega Mission.
translation.ko: 중요한 임무를 맡기게 본부에 출석을 알려 줘!

translation.en: [Max] You get to pick up a pirate ship from Beach Station
and deliver it to Museum Station so everyone can see it!
translation.ko: 모두 볼 수 있게 박물관 역으로 배달해 줘

translation.en: I can make that delivery fast, fast, fast-arr!
translation.ko: 내가 빨리, 빨리, 더 빨리 배달할 수 있어!

translation.en: Please, please, please can Diesel and I come with you?
translation.ko: 제발 부탁이야 디젤이랑 나도 따라가게 해 줘

translation.en: We love pirates! We even look like pirates!
translation.ko: 해적 진짜 좋아하거든 겉모습도 해적이랑 비슷해

translation.en: Sure! Ye shall be me trusty crew!
Alright, Pirate Express! It's time to…
-Hook up! -To the beat of my sweet track!
It's wash time! Break it down!
♪ It's time to clean up ♪ ♪ It's time to tune up ♪
translation.ko: 그럼 이제 세차할 시간 정비도 하고

translation.en: [Max] And now it's time to hook up, with your Super Extendo Car!
translation.ko: 이제 대형 확장 차량을 연결할 차례야

translation.en: The only car big enough to carry a mighty pirate ship!
translation.ko: 큰 해적선을 실을 수 있는 건 이 차량뿐이지

translation.en: And I'll ride along too! There's no way I'd miss this pirate adventure!
translation.ko: 나도 따라갈게 해적 모험은 절대 놓칠 수 없지

translation.en: Keep an eye out for any scallywags, crew!
Don't worry, I brought my trusty water balloon car!
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 믿음직한 내 물 풍선 차를 가져왔거든

translation.en: In case of any high-seas pirate battles!
Great thinking, Captain Flicker! About these battles…
translation.ko: - 잘 생각했어, 플리커 선장 - 그 전투 말인데…

translation.en: According to my calculations, that really is Trackbeard's ship!
translation.ko: 내 계산에 따르면 저건 턱수염 기차 해적선이 맞아

translation.en: Time to load this ship onto the Super Extendo Car!
translation.ko: 이제 대형 확장 차량에 해적선을 싣자

translation.en: Phew! Pirate ship aboard and ready to go!
♪ To ports unknown, The ocean, our home ♪
♪ It's pirate treasure we seek, arr! ♪
I'll get it! Mega Grabber Claw, activate!
translation.ko: 내가 잡을게, 메가 집게 팔 작동!

translation.en: We gotta get that ship back!
♪ But we'll definitely need More speed, arr! ♪
[Faye] Time to get back in your pen, piggies!
♪ A pirate crew are we ♪ ♪ Chasing our ship we need ♪
Huh? Now where'd those little oinkers go?
The Popstar Piggies pillaged our pirate ship!
translation.ko: 팝 스타 돼지들이 우리 해적선을 빼앗아 갔어

translation.en: The pirate piggie ship is about to run out of tracks up ahead!
translation.ko: 돼지 해적선이 곧 철길을 벗어날 거야!

translation.en: I'll just make a switch! No problemo.
I can't believe it! I did it!
I mean, of course I did it.
We're supposed to deliver the ship to the museum, not crash into it!
translation.ko: 배를 박물관에 배달하랬지 충돌시키라곤 안 했잖아

translation.en: Okay, piggies! Time to walk the plank!
Hoo-ee! That was a close call!
But now we gotta get you piggies back to the farm.
translation.ko: 이제 너희 돼지들을 농장에 데려다줘야 해

translation.en: Well, the delivery didn't go exactly as planned.
But we did get the ship to Museum Station!
Hey! There's a message here! What's it say, what's it say?!
translation.ko: - 야, 여기 메시지가 있어! - 뭐라고 적혀 있어?

translation.en: It says… “If ye think ye be mighty brave, then take me ship back to me cave.”
translation.ko: '네가 엄청 용감하다고 생각하면 내 배를 동굴로 가져와라'

translation.en: The map shows how to get there! X marks the spot!
translation.ko: 지도에 길이 나와 있어 동굴에는 X 표시가 돼 있고

translation.en: The pirate ship has been delivered to Museum Station!
But… we found a map that leads to Trackbeard's lair!
translation.ko: 턱수염 기차의 은신처로 가는 지도를 찾았어

translation.en: Yeah! But the cave is way out in the ocean,
and the map says we have to take the pirate ship back there.
translation.ko: 지도에 그 해적선을 거기에 갖다 놓으라고 쓰여 있어

translation.en: His lair could have a lot more pirate things to put in the museum!
translation.ko: 그 동굴에는 박물관에 전시할 해적 물건이 더 많을 거야

translation.en: Okay, Mighty Express! New Mega Mission!
translation.ko: 마이티 익스프레스 중요한 임무를 새로 줄게

translation.en: Follow the map, and sail the pirate ship back to Trackbeard's cave!
translation.ko: 지도를 따라서 해적선을 타고 턱수염 기차의 동굴로 가

translation.en: We get to sail the pirate ship?!
Roger that! This pirate crew is ready for more adventure!
translation.ko: 알았어, 우리 해적단은 더 많은 모험을 할 준비가 됐어

translation.en: Can Diesel and I ride on Trackbeard's ship?
translation.ko: 디젤이랑 내가 턱수염 기차 해적선에 타도 돼?

translation.en: Okay! But be careful up there! And I'll take your water balloon car.
translation.ko: - 알았어, 하지만 조심해 - 물 풍선 차는 내가 끌고 갈게

translation.en: ♪ To ports unknown, The ocean, our home ♪
♪ It's pirate treasure we seek, arr! ♪
Whoa! Is it just me, or is Gusty Gulch
translation.ko: 내 기분인가? 오늘 돌풍 협곡에 바람이 유난히 거세네
오늘 돌풍 협곡에 바람이 유난히 거세네

translation.en: Wait, what?! We lost the map?!
Uh, is it just me, or are we going faster than fast, fast, faster?
translation.ko: 내 기분인가? 점점 더 빨리 달리는 거 같아

translation.en: Huh. I didn't know pirate ships could fly.
Hang on! Mega Grabber Claw… activate!
Oh no! Now we're in the water?!
What are we gonna do?! This is terrible!
translation.ko: 어쩌지? 큰일 났다 이건 완전히 재난이야

translation.en: This is totally bad! This is…
translation.ko: 어쩌지? 큰일 났다 이건 완전히 재난이야 이건… 잠깐만

translation.en: Ships are supposed to be in the water. I knew that.
translation.ko: 배는 원래 물에 떠다니는 거잖아 알고 있었어

translation.en: The good news: Flicker and Diesel are okay.
translation.ko: 좋은 소식은 플리커와 디젤이 무사하다는 거야

translation.en: The bad news: They broke the ship's steering wheel!
translation.ko: 나쁜 소식은 배의 키가 망가졌다는 거야

translation.en: Pirate in danger! Pirate in danger!
The ship's floating right toward super pointy rocks!
translation.ko: 배가 엄청 뾰족한 바위로 돌진하고 있어!

translation.en: [gasping] I know how to steer the ship past those rocks!
translation.ko: 바위를 피해 가도록 내가 배를 조종할 수 있어

translation.en: Bam! Day and pirate ship saved!
Yeah! But… [Nico] Now it's headed out to sea.
translation.ko: 응, 근데 배가 바다로 가고 있어

translation.en: Flicker, you're out of water balloon range!
You'll need to steer the ship!
[Nico] Can you fix the steering wheel?
Oh, no! We're missing a part!
[gasping] That's it! My toy pirate sword!
translation.ko: 바로 그거야, 내 장난감 해적 칼!

translation.en: Captain Flicker is ready to steer!
It's my first time sailing a pirate ship.
Diesel, fetch the map so we can find the pirate cave!
translation.ko: 디젤, 지도 가져와 해적 동굴을 찾아야지

translation.en: Captain Flick-Arr will be on the lookout
for any scallywags lurking in these waters.
translation.ko: 물속에 숨어 있는 악당을 찾아낼 거야

translation.en: [gasping] There it is! Trackbeard's secret cave lair!
translation.ko: 저기 있다 턱수염 기차의 비밀 동굴!

translation.en: Avast, matey! There be something lurking in the water!
Ah! Scallywag! I mean, giant octopus!
Ah, well. It was worth a shot.
it looks like you stopped. Is everything all right?
Things are very, very, very, very not all right!
translation.ko: 상황이 매우, 매우, 매우 안 좋아

translation.en: [Nico] A giant octopus is holding onto us!
-[microphone feedback] -Calling all trains! We have an emergency!
We have to get out there and save them.
But how are we gonna get across the water?
"If tracks to me lair ye seek…" Ah! "Pull me switch…" Whoa! "…by yonder creek!"
translation.ko: '내 동굴로 가는 철길을 찾으려면 저쪽 물가에 있는 스위치를 당겨'

translation.en: There must be a hidden switch around here somewhere!
translation.ko: 여기 어딘가에 스위치가 숨겨져 있을 거야

translation.en: I wish we knew what the switch looks like.
I think I found the switch.
Well, my big toe found it.
Okay, Mighty Express! Let's make tracks!
My big bro! And all the Mighty trains!
translation.ko: 우리 형이다! 마이티 기차들도 다 왔어
넌 지금 안전 규정을 157개나 어기고 있어

translation.en: Mighty Express, we need a Mighty Move.
translation.ko: 마이티 익스프레스 따끔한 맛을 보여 주자

translation.en: Well, it's a good thing pirate ships can fly!
[Flicker] We're heading toward Trackbeard's hidden treasure!
translation.ko: 턱수염 기차의 숨겨진 보물을 향해 가고 있어

translation.en: There be the entrance to Trackbeard's cave!
Let's bring this ship in, mateys!
Arr you seeing what I'm seeing?!
Captain Flick-Arr and his mighty pirate crew present…
You know what? I say we leave the ship right here.
We can turn the whole cave into a pirate museum!
translation.ko: 동굴 전체를 해적 박물관으로 만드는 거야

translation.en: Thanks to the mighty pirate crew of Flicker, Nico, Nate, and Diesel!
translation.ko: 다 플리커, 니코, 네이트, 디젤의 마이티 해적단 덕분이야

translation.en: ♪ To ports unknown, The ocean, our home, ♪
♪ Now it's pirate treasure we keep, arr! ♪
translation.ko: 이제 우리가 지키는 건 해적 보물
